article.class: post-9772 post type-post status-publish format-image has-post-thumbnail hentry category-events post_format-post-format-image pmpro-has-access

div.p: As we continue to follow guidance from our local authorities and in cooperation with our neighboring school districts, we are making the difficult decision to close our schools through April 3rd. This is uncharted territory for everyone and the situation continues to change by the minute. We will continue to keep you updated as we go along.

Beginning Monday, March 23rd, we will begin serving FREE meals to all children 18 & under in the community. Meals will be served grab & go at the Bronaugh High School and the Community Center in Moundville at 8:30AM each morning, Monday through Friday. Please stay in your vehicle, we will bring them out to you. We will serve breakfast and lunch at the same time for you to take to your homes. If you are in the situation of needing meals delivered to your home, PLEASE let us know and we are happy to make arrangements to meet your needs. For meal preparation purposes, please go to this link: http://bit.ly/WildcatMeals

div.class: post-9416 post type-post status-publish format-image has-post-thumbnail hentry category-events post_format-post-format-image pmpro-has-access

div.p:
Bronaugh R-VII School District
527 E 6th St.
Bronaugh, MO 64728
